title: Roger Stone: "Stone's Rules: How to Win at Politics, Business, and Style"
description: Michael Smerconish talks with the one and only Roger Stone about his book "Stone's Rules," his guiding principles during a truly singular career. Original air date 5 May 2018. Book published 8 May 2018.
